item.title: F-35 fighter jet crashes in California, Navy says
item.description: An F-35 fighter jet crashed at Naval Air Station Lemoore in central California on Wednesday, the Navy confirmed.

item.title: 25 hospitalized after 'significant' turbulence on Delta flight
item.description: Twenty-five people aboard a Delta Air Lines flight were hospitalized after the flight encountered "significant" turbulence Wednesday, the airline said...

item.title: Trump admin lifted sanctions on Israeli accused of killing Palestinian activist
item.description: President Joe Biden sanctioned Yinon Levi in 2024 for violence against Palestinians.

item.title: WATCH: Kamala Harris says she won't run for governor of California in 2026
item.description: Former Vice President Kamala Harris announced Wednesday that she wonâ€™t run for California governor in 2026.

item.title: WATCH: Russian kitchen gets shaken during massive earthquake
item.description: The strength of the powerful earthquake that struck off Russia's Pacific coast on July 30 was dramatically demonstrated in video released by the local...
